creditline: The Driscoll Art Accessions Endowment Fund and bequest of Virginia Doneghy, by exchange
dimension:
34 3/4 × 19 in. (88.3 × 48.3 cm)
13 1/16 × 18 in. (33.2 × 45.7 cm) (object part, top sheet)
12 1/8 × 19 in. (30.8 × 48.3 cm) (object part, middle sheet)
9 1/2 × 12 in. (24.1 × 30.5 cm) (object part, bottom sheet)
inscription: on back of bottom sheet in pencil: Steinmetz | on back of bottom sheet in pencil: 12 (circled)
text: Three vertically configured sheets of yellowish paper (received affixed together with tape) of different sizes; top sheet has hat-like form with green and brown lines; red arrows at center of left and right edges; green vertical lines at bottom with four small arcing railroad track elements; center sheet has repeating organic vertical pattern with brown and green ovals and red diamonds; bottom sheet has rectangle split into three vertical rectangles; central section has nine geometric elements in red, brown, and grey made of squares and rectangles; left and right sections have red horizontal lines; bottom sheet detached
title: Steinmetz
